attributes.action: Stop the labour agency's robbing the self employed construction workers through having to pay an umbrella company to recive wages
attributes.additional_details: Umbrella company's - why should hardworking self employed construction workers have to pay an umbrella company anything from £10 - 25 a week just to receive the wages that we have earned - say no to agency's and say no to umbrella  company's taking a large cut of working mans wages - this amounts to robbery - 10,000 signatures and parlement must hear it , please share this and sign  maybe we can get something done
